questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's background?
What is the overall shape of the product packaging?
What material appears to constitute the packaging?
What is the primary text visible on the front of the package?
What is the apparent texture of the packaging surface?
What is the color of the brand name text on the packaging?
What is the apparent finish of the packaging surface?
What weight, in grams, is indicated on the package?
What kind of information is predominantly printed on the back?
Is there any apparent embossing or debossing on the surface?
Are there any images besides the text on the packaging?
What is the style of the font used for the brand name?
Does the packaging show any signs of damage or wear?
What is the orientation of the text on the main label?
Is there any visible bar code or other identification numbers?
